```lisp
[
  (:action pour ; Pour a liquid into a container and modify the state of related objects
    :parameters (?liquid - liquid ?container - container ?object - object)
    :precondition (and (location ?liquid source) (location ?container target_location) (orientation ?object initial_orientation) (composition ?object initial_composition))
    :effect (and (location ?liquid ?container) (composition ?object modified_composition))),
    
  (:action remove ; Remove an object from its current location
    :parameters (?obj - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (orientation ?obj ?loc)
    :effect (orientation ?obj removed)),
    
  (:action dry ; Dry an object and update its state
    :parameters (?obj - object)
    :precondition (composition ?obj wet)
    :effect (composition ?obj dry)),
    
  (:action make ; Generalized action for making or transforming an object's state
    :parameters (?obj - object ?state_before - state ?state_after - state)
    :precondition (composition ?obj ?state_before)
    :effect (composition ?obj ?state_after))
]
```
